Ruinous Onslaught.name: Ruinous Onslaught
Ruinous Onslaught.fullText:
Warforged Juggernaut Attack 11Ruinous Onslaught

You end your reckless charge with a brutal blow that throws your enemy backward, rattling its nerves.

Encounter        Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.


Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 66.
Ruinous Onslaught.flavor: You end your reckless charge with a brutal blow that throws your enemy backward, rattling its nerves.
Ruinous Onslaught.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Ruinous Onslaught.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Inexorable Momentum.name: Inexorable Momentum
Inexorable Momentum.fullText:
Warforged Juggernaut Utility 12Inexorable Momentum

To attack your chosen adversary, you hurtle across the battlefield, shrugging off attacks.

Encounter  
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you ignore difficult terrain, can move through enemy spaces, and gain a +2 power bonus to AC against opportunity attacks.


Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 66.
Inexorable Momentum.flavor: To attack your chosen adversary, you hurtle across the battlefield, shrugging off attacks.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you ignore difficult terrain, can move through enemy spaces, and gain a +2 power bonus to AC against opportunity attacks.
Inexorable Momentum.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you ignore difficult terrain, can move through enemy spaces, and gain a +2 power bonus to AC against opportunity attacks.

Crag of Steel.name: Crag of Steel
Crag of Steel.fullText:
Warforged Juggernaut Attack 20Crag of Steel

You lock yourself into position, holding your ground with a defensive posture and a series of deadly attacks.

Daily        Stance, Weapon
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the stance ends, you gain resist 5 to all damage, and whenever this reduces an attack’s damage to 0, you also negate that attack’s effect on you. Additionally, until the stance ends, you can reduce the distance you are pulled, pushed, or slid by 5 squares, and any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage while you are able to make opportunity attacks.


Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 66.
Crag of Steel.flavor: You lock yourself into position, holding your ground with a defensive posture and a series of deadly attacks.
Crag of Steel.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain resist 5 to all damage, and whenever this reduces an attack’s damage to 0, you also negate that attack’s effect on you. Additionally, until the stance ends, you can reduce the distance you are pulled, pushed, or slid by 5 squares, and any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage while you are able to make opportunity attacks.
